. It has 10,464 inhabitants. Near Nové Město na Moravě, there is a test facility of EGU Brno. Although it may be not possible to visit this installation, you should have a closer look on it as to this facility a transmission tower belongs, which looks like a construction of Gyro Gearloose and is therefore nicknamed "Gyro Gearloose Tower".

You might be in trouble with comunication around Nové Město. Most of the people there (with many exceptions) speak only Czech mayby a little bit Russian. But younger people (25 and younger) mostly speak very good Englis.
